files.filename: Mini Course - What Makes Up A Chord_.gp
files.title: Mini Course - What Makes Up A Chord
files.description: Learn the fundamental building blocks of chords - root notes, intervals, and triads. Perfect for understanding chord construction.

files.title: Basic Subdivisions at 85 BPM
files.description: Master rhythmic subdivisions with this essential timing exercise. Practice quarter notes, eighth notes, and sixteenth notes.

files.title: Mini Course - Lick Building
files.description: Discover how to construct memorable guitar licks from scales and arpeggios. Build your vocabulary of phrases.

files.title: Pentatonic Major - All Keys
files.description: Complete reference for major pentatonic scale in all 12 keys. The foundation of rock, blues, and country soloing.

files.title: Pentatonic Minor - All Keys
files.description: Master the minor pentatonic scale in every key. Essential for blues, rock, and metal guitar solos.

files.filename: Seven Positions of the Major Scale.gp
files.title: Seven Positions of the Major Scale
files.description: Learn all seven positions of the major scale across the fretboard. Essential for comprehensive fretboard knowledge.

files.filename: Mini Course - Playing The Scale Over Each Chord.gp
files.title: Mini Course - Playing The Scale Over Each Chord
files.description: Learn how to match scales to chord changes. Develop your ear for targeting chord tones while soloing.

files.title: Minor Scale - All Keys
files.description: Natural minor scale patterns in all 12 keys. Build your foundation for modal playing and minor key improvisation.

files.title: Major Scale - All Keys
files.description: The complete major scale in all keys. The foundation of Western music theory and improvisation.

files.title: Alternate Picking - 10 Moveable Sequences
files.description: Ten essential alternate picking patterns that can be moved anywhere on the neck. Build speed and accuracy.

files.title: Alternate Run 2
files.description: Advanced alternate picking run for building speed and precision. Great for developing right-hand technique.

files.title: Minor 7 Flat 5 Arpeggios
files.description: Half-diminished arpeggios essential for jazz and fusion. Learn all positions and applications.

files.title: Extended Arpeggio
files.description: Arpeggios that span multiple octaves and positions. Develop your ability to navigate the fretboard melodically.

files.title: Extended Arpeggio 2
files.description: More extended arpeggio patterns for advanced melodic playing. Connect positions fluidly.

files.title: Guitar Gym - Arpeggio Workout
files.description: Comprehensive arpeggio workout covering major, minor, and diminished shapes. Build finger independence.

files.title: Arpeggio Sequences - C Major 7
files.description: CMaj7 arpeggio sequences for jazz vocabulary. Learn various ways to outline this essential chord.

files.title: Arpeggio Study 4
files.description: Technical study focusing on clean arpeggio execution and position shifts.

files.title: Arpeggio Study 5
files.description: Advanced arpeggio study with string skipping and wide interval jumps.

files.title: Scales & Arpeggios (4 Notes Per String)
files.description: Four-note-per-string scale and arpeggio patterns for maximum speed and efficiency.

files.title: Static Chord Soloing
files.description: Learn to solo over a single chord by targeting chord tones and using tension/release.

files.title: Pentatonic and Economy Sequences
files.description: Combine pentatonic patterns with economy picking for fluid, fast runs.

files.title: Economy Picking Fundamentals
files.description: Core economy picking concepts and exercises. Learn the most efficient way to pick across strings.

files.title: Economy Picking - Drop G Tuning
files.description: Economy picking exercises adapted for drop G tuning. Perfect for extended range guitars.

files.title: Economy Picking - 4 Examples
files.description: Four practical examples of economy picking in musical contexts. Apply technique to real licks.

files.title: Economy Picking - 10 Moveable Sequences
files.description: Ten economy picking patterns that can be transposed to any key. Build your lick vocabulary.

files.title: Economy Picking - Lesson 4
files.description: Progressive economy picking lesson building on previous concepts. Increase speed and fluidity.

files.title: Economy Picking Sequence - G Minor
files.description: G minor economy picking sequence with scale patterns and arpeggios combined.

files.title: Economy Picking - Drop G Exercises
files.description: Additional economy picking exercises for drop G tuning. Extended range technique development.

files.filename: Exercise 1 Part 5 Picking Etiquette - Four Notes Per String, Skipping Strings.gp
files.title: Picking Etiquette - String Skipping
files.description: Four-note-per-string patterns with string skipping. Develop accurate picking across non-adjacent strings.

files.filename: Exercise 3 Part 3 LAZY FIRST FINGER KILLER 1.gp
files.title: Lazy First Finger Killer
files.description: Exercises to strengthen your index finger independence. Eliminate weak finger habits.

files.filename: Exercise 1 Part 4 Picking Etiquette - Four Notes Per String, Adjacent Strings.gp
files.title: Picking Etiquette - Adjacent Strings
files.description: Four-note-per-string patterns on adjacent strings. Build smooth string transitions.

files.title: 5 Legato Pentatonic Patterns
files.description: Five legato patterns using the pentatonic scale. Develop fluid hammer-ons and pull-offs.

files.title: Legato - 7 Examples
files.description: Seven examples of legato technique in musical contexts. From simple to complex phrases.

files.title: Guitar Gym - Legato Workout
files.description: Comprehensive legato workout for building left-hand strength and independence.

files.title: Legato - 10 Moveable Sequences
files.description: Ten legato sequences that can be moved to any position. Build your legato vocabulary.

files.title: Fun Lick
files.description: A fun, musical lick to add to your repertoire. Great for jam sessions and improvisation.

files.title: Scale Sequencing - Pentatonic Ascending 4s
files.description: Ascending four-note sequences through the pentatonic scale. Build speed with patterns.

files.title: 50 Essential Pentatonic Sequences Part 2
files.description: Continuation of essential pentatonic sequences. Expand your improvisational options.

files.title: Pentatonic Etudes - 15 Moveable Sequences
files.description: Fifteen pentatonic etudes for developing musicality and technique simultaneously.

files.filename: Pentatonic II 3nps Vertical Pivots in E Minor.gp
files.title: Pentatonic - 3NPS Vertical Pivots in E Minor
files.description: Three-note-per-string pentatonic patterns with vertical position shifts in E minor.

files.title: Pentatonic - 3-1-3 Groupings
files.description: Pentatonic patterns using 3-1-3 note groupings for unique phrasing and rhythm.

files.title: Pentatonic Extended Sequence - A Minor
files.description: Extended pentatonic sequence spanning multiple positions in A minor.

files.title: All Scale Types in Key of C
files.description: Comprehensive reference of all common scale types in C. Major, minor, modes, and exotic scales.

files.title: All Scales in Key of D
files.description: Complete scale reference in the key of D. Essential for understanding key relationships.

files.title: All Scales in Key of Gb
files.description: All scale types in Gb/F#. Master this challenging but rewarding key.

files.title: All Scales in Key of Eb
files.description: Complete scale reference in Eb. Common key for jazz and blues.

files.title: All Scales in Key of Ab
files.description: All scales in Ab major/F minor. Popular key for ballads and R&B.

files.filename: All Scales in the Key of Bb.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of Bb
files.description: Scale reference in Bb. Essential for playing with horn sections.

files.filename: All Scales in the Key of D#.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of D#/Eb
files.description: Complete D#/Eb scale reference. Enharmonic equivalent exercises.

files.filename: All Scales in the Key of F#.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of F#
files.description: All scale types in F#. Great for developing fretboard mastery.

files.filename: All Scales in the Key of G#.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of G#/Ab
files.description: G#/Ab scale reference covering all common scale types.

files.filename: All Scales in the Key of A.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of A
files.description: Complete scale reference in A. One of the most guitar-friendly keys.

files.filename: All Scales in the Key of E.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of E
files.description: All scales in E major/minor. The quintessential guitar key.

files.title: Hexatonic Scale Sequences
files.description: Six-note scale sequences for modern fusion and progressive playing styles.

files.filename: All Scales in the Key of A#.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of A#/Bb
files.description: A#/Bb scale reference. Important for playing in flat keys.

files.filename: All Scales in the Key of B.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of B
files.description: Complete B major/minor scale reference. Common rock and metal key.

files.filename: All Scales in the Key of F.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of F
files.description: F major scale reference. Important key for understanding chord progressions.

files.filename: All Scales in the Key of G.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of G
files.description: All scales in G. Popular key for acoustic and folk music.

files.filename: All Scales in Key of C#.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of C#
files.description: C# scale reference for complete fretboard knowledge.

files.filename: All Scales in Key of Db.gp
files.title: All Scales in Key of Db
files.description: Db scale reference. Enharmonic to C#, essential for reading music.

files.title: Scale Exercise
files.description: General scale exercise for building technique and muscle memory.

files.title: Hexatonic Scale Sequences in G
files.description: Six-note scale patterns in G for modern melodic development.

files.title: 7 Harmonic Minor Arpeggio Sequences
files.description: Seven arpeggio sequences derived from the harmonic minor scale. Essential for neoclassical playing.

files.title: Harmonic Minor Arpeggios - E Standard
files.description: Harmonic minor arpeggios in standard tuning. Develop your neoclassical vocabulary.

files.title: Insane Two-Handed Lick
files.description: Advanced two-hand tapping lick for extreme speed and coordination. Impressive showpiece.

files.title: Sweep/Economy Pentatonic Sequence Part 1
files.description: Combine sweep and economy picking through pentatonic patterns for maximum efficiency.

files.description: Five sweep/economy picking patterns for pentatonic scales. Build speed and fluidity.

files.title: Sweep Picking - 10 Moveable Sequences
files.description: Ten sweep picking arpeggios that can be transposed anywhere. Essential for shred technique.

files.title: Short Tapping Sequence
files.description: Concise tapping sequence for developing two-hand coordination and accuracy.

files.title: Tapping - 10 Moveable Sequences
files.description: Ten essential tapping patterns that can be moved across the fretboard. Build your tapping vocabulary.
